trans-unit.source: Contains arguments associated with changes to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" />.
trans-unit.target: 包含與 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" /> 變更關聯的引數。

trans-unit.source: Attached events supported by this delegate include are provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager> class, and include <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> (<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInput>), <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> (<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInputStart>), and <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> (<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInputUpdate>).
trans-unit.target: 這個委派所支援的附加的事件包含所提供的<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager>類別，並包含<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>(<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInput>)， <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> (<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInputStart>)，和<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate>(<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInputUpdate>)。

trans-unit.source: The input device associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: 與這個事件關聯的輸入裝置。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" /> object associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: 與這個事件關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs" /> class, taking a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputDevice" /> and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" /> as initial values for the class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體，並將指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputDevice" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" /> 做為類別的初始值。

trans-unit.source: Gets control text associated with a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 取得與 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" /> 事件關聯的控制項文字。

trans-unit.source: A string containing any control text associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含與這個事件關聯的任何控制項文字。

trans-unit.source: The generic handler to call in a type-specific way.
trans-unit.target: 以特定型別的方式呼叫的泛型處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The target to call the handler on.
trans-unit.target: 對其呼叫處理常式的目標。

trans-unit.source: Invokes event handlers in a type-specific way, which can increase event system efficiency.
trans-unit.target: 以型別專屬的方式叫用事件處理常式，這樣做能夠提升事件系統的效率。

trans-unit.source: This implementation casts the generic handler as a <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventHandler> and then invokes it.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會轉換為一般處理常式時為<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventHandler>然後再叫用。

trans-unit.source: For details on this implementation pattern and the reasons for it, see <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A> and [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需這項實作模式及它的理由的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A>和[路由傳送事件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets system text associated with a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 取得與 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" /> 事件關聯的系統文字。

trans-unit.source: A string containing any system text associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含與這個事件關聯的任何系統文字。

trans-unit.source: Gets input text associated with a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 取得與 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" /> 事件關聯的輸入文字。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the input text associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含與這個事件關聯的任何輸入文字。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" /> associated with a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 取得與 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" /> 事件關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" /> object containing the text composition associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" /> 物件，其中包含與這個事件關聯的文字撰寫。
